name: Black Floor
description:
32 challenging levels avaid you in this game.

How to play:

Collect the colored squares in the same order as they are shown in the bottom-right corner (left to right) to unlock the portal to the next level.

Your enemies gain speed after each step, so try to clear a level fast.

Bottom-left shows you the movement pattern of the skulls (might be useful for you at higher levels). U, D, L, R stands for UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT and a number before the letter means the movement in this direction is repeated n times.

Try to collect every gold coin in  each level as additional challenge. 'Best time' will soon be an element of the game too.

Controls:

Use WASD / Arrow keys or the left stick of your Xbox-Controller to move around.

Additional info:

This is the first release version of the game. I am going to update it soon with a feature showing you the best time of each level and you will be able to play each unlocked level individually.
